title: Adaptive Learning-Based Elementary Language Teaching Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service and in-service elementary teachers to practice personalized language teaching strategies in VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners diagnose prior knowledge levels and design personalized instructional strategies with 80% accuracy.
Learners improve learner engagement by 30% using adaptive learning tools in a VR simulation environment.
Formative assessments enable real-time analysis of learners' comprehension and the development of feedback provision plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
